item.title: Error in this command, should be a simple fix for others
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

if (command.startsWith("bluephat")) { if (!playerHasItemAmount(995, 250000000)) { sendMessage("You don't have enough coins."); return; } deleteItem(995, GetItemSlot(995), 250000000); addItem(1042, 1); }

Read full topic
item.source: Error in this command, should be a simple fix for others

item.title: Error in this command, should be a simple fix for others
item.dc:creator: @Maticus Maticus
item.description:
@Maticus wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“bluephat”) && playerRights >= 0) {
deleteItem(995, GetItemSlot(995), 250000000);
addItem(1042, 1);

}[/code]

You see, I want to make it so I don’t have to tender rares, and I don’t want to set up a store so I put this together.

I did discover a giant bug that makes this code stupid.

Even if you don’t have the cash, it still gives you the item, what should be added as a correction?

Read full topic
item.source: Error in this command, should be a simple fix for others
